snippet: A man called firefighters to his house in a suburb of Atlanta and then held them hostage for almost four hours until he was shot when the police stormed the house Wednesday evening.
abstract: Man who police say was in deep financial trouble calls firefighters to his house in Atlanta suburb Suwanee and then holds them hostage for almost four hours until he is shot to death as police storm house.

byline.contributor: Robbie Brown contributed reporting from Suwanee, Ga.

lead_paragraph: A man called firefighters to his house in a suburb of Atlanta and then held them hostage for almost four hours until he was shot when the police stormed the house Wednesday evening.

headline.main: Man Takes Firefighters Hostage and Dies in Raid, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Man Takes Firefighters Hostage and Dies in Raid, Police Say
